dashboards: Dashboard C — Quality & Safety (Wave 08) | Security monitoring dashboards (Wave 06) | Dashboard B — Vendor Health (Wave 08)
smoke_tests: ST-040 (tier2_verified_no_match) | ST-041 (tier2_verified_match) | ST-010 (tier0 chargeback_dispute) | ST-070/071 (kill switch tests)

title: Backlog catch-up and DLQ handling
first_lever: Increase worker reserved concurrency gradually (Wave 07 playbook).

title: Cost spike / token runaway
dashboards: Dashboard C — Quality & Safety (Wave 08) | Dashboard B — Vendor Health (Wave 08)
